newsitem.title: USA: Silicon Valley Research to place stock.
newsitem.headline: Silicon Valley Research to place stock.

text.p: Silicon Valley Research Inc said Monday it was in talks to place up to $4.0 million worth of stock and warrants with private investors, including current stockholders and members of the company's board.
The stock and warrants will be sold in unregistered units at a discount to the stock's current market price, it said.
Silicon Valley Research was off 1/16 at 1-1/8 in early trading.
The company plans to issue 4.0 million shares along with warrants for an equal number of shares, which would amount to about 33 percent of outstanding shares.
Proceeds from the placement will be used for working capital to finance Silicon Valley Research's product development and sales efforts.

In particular, the company intends to release major upgrades to nearly all of its products in the next three months, including GARDS-V9.0 with a new Power Router, SonIC-V3.0 with an extremely fast new placer, and SC-V5.0 with a re-written Global Router and fast new placement.
